Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Player
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
A class containing all the data of a game player like his name, color, the god power he chose at the start of the game and his workers.
See Also:
Game, Worker

    • canMove

      public boolean canMove()
      Examine the cell around the player's workers
      Returns:
      true if the player can make at least one move

    • workerCanMove

      public boolean workerCanMove​(int worker)
      Examine the cell around a worker to check if he can move
      Returns:
      true if is there at least one cell around the worker where he can move
